en.title: Bycicle package
en.description:
Ce forfait comprend une nuit√©e en chambre Gondor ou Fangorn, un d√Æner ou un d√©jeuner, un petit d√©jeuner, une boisson de r√©cup√©ration (du genre houblonn√©e), acc√®s √† la piscine chauff√©e et sauna.


About the bycicle üö¥

We reserve a special welcome for our cyclist friends. Your bikes will be safe in a closed courtyard. If you wish to cycle all day, a special picnic to go can be provided. On the spot you can also get an adapted meal for sportsmen and women.

 Martial, who is passionate about cycling, would be glad to take you along for you to discover our beautiful region, either on mountain bike or road bike. He knows all of the cycling circuits in the area, whether you wish to cycle alone or in a group. The local cycling club of Spicheren/Alsting will give you a warm welcome if you wish to join them on sunday mornings.
